title: FS: 1887 Old Judge N172, SGC (A) cheap

posts.post_title: FS: 1887 Old Judge N172, SGC (A) cheap
posts.post_content:
Ed Seward of the Philly A's, seems trimmed or o/c, an OJ none the less. Crease free, stain on back. 

$old obo, thanks!
